about.name: Aakash Goel
about.tagline: It's okay to say okay.I am frontend developer, who can code on server-side and design. Currently, I'm looking for work. Loves to contribute in tech communities. DSC Lead @ KIET

achievements: Won inter-college techfest and a hackathon powered by Github and Microsoft
Selected by Google to lead the Developer Student Clubs KIET for the year 2019-2020
Survived 4 years of graduation without any back :)

work.desc: Rebuilt the event management & candidate registration portal from PHP to NodeJS single-handedly in less than 2 months
Built the backend of annual appraisal system in Django and work on the android app developement.
Worked on the client product that helps mothers to track their health during the pre-pregnancy timeline.
Worked on the product "V-Prism", that enable news channels and other media platforms to create live feeds & then clip and upload videos to Youtube

blogs.title: How to Add Custom Fonts to React Native Projects
blogs.tagline: Being a UI designer, fonts matter a lot to me and custom fonts play an important role when it comes to building a decent looking User Interface. Today, I'll show how easy it is to add and use custom fonts in your react native project.

blogs.title: MLH Local Hack Day 2019 | hack.status(200): How we organized our first hackathon from scratch
blogs.tagline: With just a month of brainstorming, coding, and eating junk our team organized its first-ever hackathon in the college this previous week.

blogs.title: Value and Benefits of Internships
blogs.tagline: Experience is becoming a crucial factor for employers when deciding who gets their foot in the door.
